message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $130. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can we meet in the middle at $115?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  However, $115 is a bit too low for me. Could you do $120? I'm confident this product will be a great investment for you.
I understand you're confident in the product, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Can we meet at $105?
Bob, I'm trying to be fair, but I can't go as low as $105.  How about we split the difference and settle at $112? This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to split the difference, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Can we meet at $108?
